compose()[source]

Called by Textual to create child widgets.

This method is called when a widget is mounted or by setting recompose=True when calling [refresh()][textual.widget.Widget.refresh].

Note that you don’t typically need to explicitly call this method.

Example

```python def compose(self) -> ComposeResult:

yield Header() yield Label(“Press the button below:”) yield Button() yield Footer()

```

Called by Textual to create child widgets.

Note that you don’t typically need to explicitly call this method.

yield Header() yield Label(“Press the button below:”) yield Button() yield Footer()

better_launch.tui.textual_app module

class better_launch.tui.textual_app.BetterUI(launch_func, disable_colors=False, max_log_length=1000)[source]

Bases: App

TITLE: str | None = 'BetterLaunch'

A class variable to set the default title for the application.

To update the title while the app is running, you can set the [title][textual.app.App.title] attribute. See also [the Screen.TITLE attribute][textual.screen.Screen.TITLE].

BINDINGS: ClassVar[list[BindingType]] = [Binding(key='ctrl+q', action='quit', description='Quit', show=True, key_display=None, priority=False, tooltip='', id=None, system=False), Binding(key='space', action='toggle_mute', description='Mute', show=True, key_display=None, priority=False, tooltip='', id=None, system=False), Binding(key='f1', action='toggle_sidebar', description='Sidebar', show=True, key_display=None, priority=False, tooltip='', id=None, system=False), Binding(key='f2', action='toggle_log_names', description='Names', show=True, key_display=None, priority=False, tooltip='', id=None, system=False), Binding(key='f3', action='toggle_log_icons', description='Icons', show=True, key_display=None, priority=False, tooltip='', id=None, system=False)]

The default key bindings.

DEFAULT_CSS: ClassVar[str] = '\n        #sidebar {\n            width: 20%;\n            min_width: 20;\n            max_width: 40%;\n            height: 1fr;\n            background: $panel;\n\n            .-highlight {\n                text-style: italic bold;\n            }\n        }\n        #logview {\n            width: 1fr;\n            height: 1fr;\n\n            LogEntry {\n                #source {\n                    width: 25%;\n                    max-width: 30;\n                    height: 1;\n                    text-align: right;\n                }\n                #icon {\n                    width: 3;\n                    height: 1;\n                    text-align: center;\n                }\n                #message {\n                    width: 70%;\n                    text-align: left;\n                    margin-right: 1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    '

classmethod setup_logging()[source]
compose()[source]

Yield child widgets for a container.

This method should be implemented in a subclass.

Return type:

Iterable[Widget]

on_mount()[source]
exit(reason='UI terminated')[source]

Exit the app, and return the supplied result.

Parameters:

  • result – Return value.

  • return_code – The return code. Use non-zero values for error codes.

  • message – Optional message to display on exit.
